radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging of the brain
radiographic_examinations.findings: A large homogeneously enhancing sellar lesion with suprasellar extension that compressed the optic chiasm. The superior margin of the mass had a pointed configuration.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Nearly complete neuroimaging resolution of the mass, with normalization of the pituitary gland, observed after 1 month of treatment.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging of the brain
radiographic_examinations.findings: Interval regression in the size of the pituitary lesion. The pituitary gland has an upward convex margin along the infundibulum, with no mass effect displacing the chiasm. The enhancement pattern is homogeneous with no evidence to suggest underlying adenoma.
